question.answer: only if you are hot, can cook, play guitar, or spell "definitely"
my roommates begged me to take my belching skills elsewhere.

yes, many. anything to prevent me from doing homework. i love organizing my closet. jeans and underwear folded in thirds, socks grouped by color, shirts hung in rainbow order and grouped by style, purpose, and texture, long-sleeve tees and pajamas in drawer 2, hats and bags in the crate on top, short sleeve and tank tops neatly folded in the bin under my bed, and shoes ordered by style. i know where everything is. i also love to bake. i once spent so much time making a lemon cheesecake because i had to grate the zest and juice the lemons by hand that i almost threw it away when it was done because i thought it was poisoned (lemon overdose - it gave me a horrible stomachache but everyone else thought it was good). and i enjoy building houses for the less fortunate. while you selfish bastards tumbled down the snowy slopes of north america during winter break, i slaved away in the summer heat of zambia for two weeks, moving cement blocks and pushing wheelbarrows of sand and gravel, eating caterpillars and chihuahua, and battling flies, persistent merchants, and tickle-happy children. one of the best two weeks of my life. looking forward to something similar in chile during the summer. i also enjoy snowboarding, longboarding, rock climbing, doing anything dangerous (except drugs) and being overly critical of myself. don't you regret asking this question?
i live for loving, for making a difference in someone's life, for being more than i dare to dream, and for watching the Man die a slow, painful death while eating his own poo.

this is a torturous question. now let me look through my 5000 mp3's and 100 cds and choose... i can't. but i've always loved just like heaven by the cure. 3:33 3.25MB but just to clarify, i also have it on cd.

the ouija board said 86; the carne asada quesadilla i had today will ensure my brain turns to mad cow-induced tofu at 32. but ideally, i'd like to live until i'm satisfied that i've been a good mother.
from the secondhand smoke of someone who thought they loved you. or without knowing true happiness.

only enough to buy me a sailboat ($869,438. i'm not that greedy). i'd tell thricebowl that i was buying us a sailboat, take off around the world, and only be seen and heard from through pictures and postcards. of course not.
that's a toughie, but mariah carey is definitely the most hateable. that's why i take her likeness with me to the shooting range.
what is george w's definition of "weapons of mass destruction?"
beats me, but he was clearly looking at another dictionary. or maybe it was upside down.
